sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"骄傲的，傲慢的"之意。
means: haughty ： 较正式用词，多用于贬义。指对身份或地位比自己低的人采取冷淡、轻视或鄙互的态度。
proud ： 含义广，普通用词。褒义指自豪和荣耀以及强烈的自尊；贬义则指傲慢，自以为是或自鸣得意。
arrogant ： 用于贬义，指过高估计自己，以致骄傲自大或傲慢无礼，目中无人。
vain ： 指一个对自己的外表或对自己留给别的印象太过分地关注，以致自命不凡，自鸣得意。

sentence.Network_en: He is spoiled, arrogant and has a tendency towards snobbery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被宠坏了，傲慢无礼，而且经常自命不凡。

sentence.Network_en: He said that the press had misrepresented him as arrogant and bullying.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说新闻媒体把他歪曲成了一个傲慢而又霸道的人。

sentence.Network_en: Kenneth is an arrogant, rude, social snob.
sentence.Network_cn: 肯尼斯是一个傲慢粗鲁只喜欢结交权贵的势利鬼。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... arrogate v 霸占；擅取 arrogant a 傲慢的 arrogance n 傲慢.
用英语形容一个人的品质_爱问知识人 ... confident 自信的 arrogant 自大的 jealous 妒忌的.
伉字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 强健〖 strong〗 骄傲〖 arrogant;conceited〗 伉 kàng.
切原赤也_百度百科 ... Zippy—— 充满活力的 Arrogant—— 嚣张（arrogant） A——一个 Baffle—— 困惑.

list.abs: ...，这是在学习期间，过了入门的阶段，就不需要了。安全考虑：security consideration傲慢行为：arrogant behavior多极化：multipolarity
arrogantly 自大地arrogate to 硬性归于arrogate 冒称
arrogant person looks down on others ., 傲慢的人看不起其他人.
【摘要】 不可一世(insufferably arrogant)(Viva Live) 魔鬼的主意(Devil's desire)(Viva Live) 活着VIVA(Living Viva)(Viva Live).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Old French from Latin arrogant- 'claiming for oneself', from the verb arrogare (see arrogate)

encyclopedia.content: [ˈærəɡənt] adj. 傲慢的， 自大的 John is so arrogant that he thinks he is better than everyone else. 约翰太骄傲自大，以为比谁都强。 an arrogant person 骄傲自大的人 be arrogant toward sb. 对某人傲慢无礼 傲慢的 【摘要】 arrogant adj傲慢的自大的 artery n动脉要道 aspire v有雄心立志 assassinate v暗杀

entry.def: Someone who is arrogant behaves in a proud, unpleasant way towards other people because they believe that they are more important than others.

example.tran: 那话听起来很嚣张，是不是？

means.word_mean: 1. having or showing feelings of unwarranted importance out of overbearing pride;

auth_sentence.content: Just be careful not to come across as arrogant.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just be careful not to come across as arrogant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just be careful not to come across as arrogant.

auth_sentence.content: The words that come to mind are arrogant fool.
auth_sentence.res_content: The words that come to mind are arrogant fool.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The words that come to mind are arrogant fool.

auth_sentence.content: Dimbleby depicts Monty as cautious, unimaginative and arrogant.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dimbleby depicts Monty as cautious, unimaginative and arrogant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dimbleby depicts Monty as cautious, unimaginative and arrogant.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ar一再+rog要求,问+ant……的→一再要求的→傲慢的
derogate[v.贬低,诽谤]+ory……的→adj.不敬的,诽谤的
ar一再+rog要求,问+ance表名词→一再要的→arrogance傲慢
pre预先+rog要求+ative……的→预先要求→[有]特权
ab去掉+rog要求,问+ate表动词→不再要求有→取消掉
ar一再+rog要求+ate表动词→一再要求→硬是说
de向下,坏+rog要求,问+ate表动词→坏坏的问下去→贬低
inter在……中间+rog要求,问+ate表动词→在[审问室]中问→审问
pro前+rog要求,问+ue→提前问好[下次开会日期]→休会
sur下面+rog要求+ate使……→v.使代理, 使代替

jushi.english: He always speaks in an arrogant tone.
jushi.chinese: 他总是以目中无人的口吻讲话。

jushi.english: When men are most sure and arrogant, they are commonly most mistaken.
jushi.chinese: 人们过于自信和过于傲慢之时也正是他们最易犯错之日。
